page.title: 11A DAY IN THE LIFE OF LIAM
page.content: I woke up at 8a.m. I had to struggle out because that night I had watched "The Wild Geese",a late film on TV.I climbed down out of my cabin bed and hit the light with my head. I got my clothes on and went downstairs. Next I went into the kitchen to eat my breakfast. I said 'bye to my mum at 8.30a.m. and went down the road to school. I arrived at school at 8.35a.m. and waited for my friends to come. We went into school at 9o'clock. We started with writing about the prize-giving which was the day before. At 10.40a.m. we got out for playtime. At playtime we usually play at football but this is quite difficult because there are only 5 boys and a very sloped playground. If the ball rolls away it lands in a stream at the bottom of our path. CONTINUED ON PAGE 12.
